name: The Hunt (itch) (arturhcosta)
description:
A story about a half-orc hunter, Artemis, on a quest to track down a despicable merchant. She never killed someone before, but now she needs to... Should she do it?

This game was created by Artur Costa.

Any feedback is always welcome.

I hope you enjoy it. :)


(Art is a placeholder. This concept was created by: https://www.artstation.com/kianahamm)
